main2.content1:
By accessing ADATA Web pages (adata.com) you agree to the following terms. If you do not agree to the following terms, please stop browsing、using or accessing the site.

Intellectual Property Rights All intellectual property rights to the contents of ADATA Web pages (including but not limited to any words, directions, pictures, symbols, devices, slogans) belong to ADATA and/or other applicable owners, without prior written approval you are not granted any rights to the contents of ADATA Web pages. Unless otherwise specified or as provided in these Terms or prior written approval by ADATA, you may not reproduce, storage, download, use, modify, create derivative works form, link, public broadcast, public present, public transmit, distribute, reverse engineer, decompile or otherwise attempt to extract the source code of the software to the contents in whole or in part in any form.

Purpose of Use
You may view the materials on this website and print hard copies of portions of it for your personal, non-commercial use. You must cite the source of the materials, and may not change the materials in any way. We strictly prohibit the modification and distortion of the contents of this website or use of it in a malicious manner.

Disclaimer
This site and the contents herein are provided as a convenience to you. The contents of ADATA Web pages are provided on "as is" and "as available" basis. ADATA does not warrant that its Web pages will be uninterrupted or error-free. ADATA reserves the right to revise the pages or withdraw access to them at any time. No warranty of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of title or non-infringement or implied warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose, is made in relation to the availability, accuracy, reliability or content of these pages. ADATA shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special or consequential damages, lost profits or for business interruption arising out of the use of or inability to use this service, even if ADATA has been advised of the possibility of such damages. Some jurisdictions do not allow exclusion of certain warranties or limitations of liability, so the above limitations or exclusions may not apply to you. The liability of ADATA would in such case be limited to the greatest extent permitted by law.

ADATA reserves the right to make changes to bundled accessories that do not affect the product’s main functions.

Third–party site
For your easy accessibility ADATA may include links to on the Internet that are owned or operated by others (third-party site). By linking to such third-party site, suggest you shall review and agree to that site's terms and conditions of use before using such site. You also understand and agree that ADATA has no control over the content of such third-party site and cannot assume any responsibility for material created or published by such third-party site. In addition, a link to a non-ADATA site does not imply that ADATA endorses the third-party site or the products or services referenced in such third party site.

Limitation of Submitting Material
By submitting material to any of our servers, for example, by e-mail or via the ADATA Web pages, you agree that: (1) the material will not contain any item that is unlawful or otherwise unfit for publication; (2) you will use reasonable efforts to scan and remove any viruses or other contaminating or destructive features before submitting any material; and (3) you own the material or have the unlimited right to disclose it and have the right to authorize ADATA to publish the material free of charge and/or incorporate it or any concepts described in it in ADATA’s products without accountability or liability; (4) you agree not to claim or take action against ADATA in relation to material that you submit; (5) and you agree to indemnify, defend and hold ADATA harmless from any claim or demand, losses and expenses, including reasonable attorneys’ fees and court costs made by any third party, due to or arising out of your submitting material.

Content Submitted
ADATA does not and cannot review the material that submitted by users on its site and is not responsible for such material. ADATA may at any time at its discretion remove any content submitted by users.

Protection of personal data
For the purpose of providing the service to you, you agree that ADATA may collect, process, utilize and transmit internationally any and all of your personal data and submitting information pursuant to the greatest extent permitted by applicable law.

Protection of trademark
ADATA is a registered trademark of ADATA Technology Co., Ltd. ADATA's product names are either trademarks or registered trademarks of ADATA Technology Co., Ltd. Other product and company names mentioned herein may be trademarks or trade names of their respective owners. Without the prior written consent of ADATA or other applicable owners, your access to this site should not be construed as granting, by implication, any license or right to use any marks appearing on the site.

Protection of copyright
Copyright© ADATA Technology Co., Ltd. All rights reserved

main.content4:
お客様の利権を保護するため、ご購入された製品のタイムリーな修理または交換が円滑におこなわれるように、上記の連絡先情報欄にご記入ください。
お客様から誤った情報や不完全な情報を提供された場合、またはADATAからの正しい情報を求める関連要請への返答がなかった結果として、お客様に発送することができなかった出荷について、ADATAは責任を負いません。
ADATAから2回連絡したにもかかわらず連絡が取れず、修理依頼の日から3か月以内にお客様が製品の引き取りを試みなかった場合、お客様は修理された製品を放棄したものとみなされます。適切と判断された場合、修理された製品はADATAによって廃棄されます。

popUp.content1:
Thank you for your RMA request. Your RMA number is ______________________
Shipping Instructions & RMA (Warranty Replacement) Processing Policies:
1. Print and include a copy of this form along with your return shipment
2. Pack returning item(s) in protective packaging (e.g. bubble-lined envelope, small box and etc.)
3. AVOID using plain non-protective letter envelopes, items are known to be damaged or lost during transit
4. ADATA is not liable for any damaged or lost item(s) during transit
5. RMA number MUST be clearly marked on at least two(2) locations on the outside of the return package for identification purpose during receiving
6. Package received without RMA number/unidentifiable might be rejected and returned at owner's expense
7. Customers are responsible for the one-way shipping charge to our facility, insurance and tracking are suggested
8. Ship all RMA’s to (one location serving all U.S. and Canadian customers):
ADATA Technology USA ● Attn: RMA Department ● 880 Columbia Street ● Brea ● CA 92821
9. Ensure of sufficient postage, insufficient postage may result in delayed or non-delivery
10. Processing time is approximately 3 – 5 business days upon receipt of your returned item in most cases
(May vary based on processing capacity and/or replacement product availability)
11. You may track the RMA process, upon receipt, by visiting ________________________________
12. The return shipment tracking information will be emailed to you once the replaced/repaired item is shipped
** Data Recovery/Secure Erase (NOT covered under warranty): Before proceeding and if necessary, it is suggested to consult with a professional data recovery service for assistance with recovering and/or to secure erase your data prior to returning your item(s) for RMA process. And here’s our recommendation - http://www.adata.com/en/support/dr/.

software.usbRecovery: USB ドライブオンラインリカバリ

usbRecovery.content1: USB フラッシュドライブオンラインリカバリは时间と手间を节约する修复ツールです。フラッシュドライブを接続したとき、ドライブが読み出せない、または「ドライブをフォーマットする必要があります」というメッセージが表示される场合、このオンラインツールを使用してデバイスの修复を行うことができます。分かりやすいインターフェースでドライブに存在する问题を实时解决し、时间とお金を节约できます。このオンラインツールはインターネットがあればどこからでも、年中无休でアクセスできます。
usbRecovery.content2:
* 修复プロセスはフラッシュドライブからデータをすべて削除します。使用する前にすべてのデータをバックアップしてください。
* このソフトウェアはドライブの机能を回复しますが、ドライブのデータを回复することはできません。
* ハードウェア要件：USB 2.0 ポート、インターネット接続対応（このソフトウェアが正常に机能するためには有効なオンライン接続が必要です）
* システム要件：Windows XP SP3 以降（管理者権限でログインしてください）
usbRecovery.title6: 操作手顺をお読みください
usbRecovery.content3: Step 1. 圧缩ファイルを C:\ に解冻します
usbRecovery.content4: Step 2. USB デバイスを挿入します
usbRecovery.content5: Step 3. ORU.exe をダウンロードしてクリックします
usbRecovery.content6: Step 4. USB ドライブが検出されたら、修复のオプションがあります
usbRecovery.content7: 修复の进捗状况が表示されます。
usbRecovery.content8:
Step 5. 修复が完了しました
　OK
usbRecovery.content9: 修复できませんでした. このメッセージが表示された场合は、ADATA カスタマーサービスにお问い合わせください

usbRecovery1.content1: コネクタ上のシリアル番号を确认します。
usbRecovery1.note2: 不用有图文件 直接连到support /产品保固服务/产品保期查询

usbRecovery2.content1: フラッシュドライブ コネクタ上のシリアル番号を入力します。
usbRecovery2.note: * [送信] をクリックした后、システムは正しい修复ツールを検索し、ダウンロードに提供します

usbRecovery3.content: 修复するフラッシュドライブをコンピュータに接続します。

usbRecovery4.content: 保存したファイルを実行すると、オンライン修复プロセスが开始されます。

service.content: 本保证はすべてのADATAブランド制品（本书第1条に记载されたもののみを対象とする；以下「制品」という）および制品の最初の购入者に唯一かつ完全に适用され、お客様とADATA间における、口头または书面を问わず、あらゆるその他保证および表明に优先されます。保证期间については、ご购入いただいたパッケージに记载されている期间に准じます。购入日から保证期间中は、自然の要因により损伤を受けた制品には、保守サービスが无料で提供されます。

replyMessage.scene1:
Dear Customer,

We have not yet received your product for repair. If you shipped the product to us some time ago, please confirm your shipping service’s delivery status.
replyMessage.scene2:
Dear Customer,  

Your product has been received and is in the process of being repaired. We will send you an email notification before shipping the repaired product back to you. Thank you.
replyMessage.scene3:
Dear Customer,  
Your product has been repaired and is being prepared for shipping. We will send you an email notification when the product has been shipped. Thank you.
replyMessage.scene4:
Dear Customer,

Your repaired product has been shipped, and an email notification has been sent to you. Please check your inbox. Thank you.
